txt.en: Ragnild can be found at Hultvís in Woodsedge.\n\nYou should speak to Ragnild.
'Do not underestimate the wargs that lurk now within Shathur-munzu! They are cunning and dangerous foes.'

'You have taught a lesson to the wargs, and they may decide to stay away from Shathur-munzu, and from our sheep, from now on! Thank you for your efforts on behalf of the good folk of the Vales of Anduin!'
The Beorning Ragnild is concerned about the threat posed by the wargs of Duskenvale and the dwarf ruins of Shathur-munzu.

'The warg presence in Duskenvale has grown worse of late, [placeholder], despite the banishment of Drokstaz. Two sons of the chieftain have come down from the mountains, and now they lead a pack of the beasts from within the depths of Shathur-munzu. These wargs threaten safe passage of the only road south, and we must deal with them! Will you help me with these tasks?'
Ragnild can be found at Hultvís in Woodsedge.\n\nYou should speak to Ragnild.
